nodes.documentation:
@title Campaign Factory 
@dev this factory will manage all of the campaigns and make it easy to get an array of deployed campaigns.
nodes.name: CampaignFactory

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address,string memory,uint256,string memory,uint256,string memory) returns (contract Campaign)

nodes.name: createCampaign

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get all deployed campaigns
@return array of deployed campaign addresses
nodes.name: getDeployedCampaigns
